rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, arm target creature you control. Then if you control an equipped creature with flying, all equipped creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. The same is true for agile, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
